sentence.idiomatic: Wealthy people are constantly worried about getting kidnapped.
On her way home she got kidnapped by several men.
The bad guy kidnapped his child, then demanded that he produce one million US dollars as an exchange.
Whatever you have on your mind, just say. Don't keep it inside.
There are some things I've wanted to say that I've kept to myself for a long time. Today I have to say them.
If it weren't that keeping it inside was distressing me, I wouldn't be coming out with the real story.
Walking out of the building, I immediately felt that the sunlight was extraordinarily blinding.
This light is blinding--it's not good for the eyes.
A few lines of white characters appeared on the black screen--it was really blinding.
A car beside me suddenly exploded--I was scared stiff.
His awesome goal had us all of us stunned.
He told the stories of his adventure for everyone to hear. Everyone was captivated.
At the start of the term, the school purchased a batch of new teaching apparatus.
The hospital's tooth-filling instrument is broken, please come another time.
This is the measurement data taken from the most modern surveying instruments. It is definitely accurate.
Lately his health has not been good. He went to the hospital to get a health check.
I've already checked the assignment over many times. There shouldn't be any mistakes.
Our factory conducts a major safety check every month.
His looks are average, but he is very intelligent.
As soon as I saw her appearance, I knew she was a blessed person.
If she doesn't have good looks, how can she possibly become a star?
Your hand is so dirty--don't touch me.
This kind of material is soft and comfortable. If you don't believe me, touch it.
The baby's face is just so cute, I can't help but want to touch it.
I'll tell you guys a secret. But first, you guys have got to believe me.
If there's a secret just hurry up and tell us.
I have been abducted by aliens.
Huh? A dream?
I'm telling the truth. This is something that happened many years ago. I didn't want to talk about it originally, but keeping it to myself is just too hard.
How were you abducted?

word.literal: to be unable to fall asleep

sentence.idiomatic: I remember it very clearly. I was a high school student at the time, and we went to the countryside to study agriculture. That night I couldn't sleep, so I went for a walk in the fields by myself.
This is clearly straight out of a sci-fi movie. How could it be your story?
Don't interrupt him. Let him finish.
Yeah, at least you understand. While I was walking, suddenly a blinding white light was before me, and I couldn't see anything. When I opened my eyes, there was a flying saucer in front of me.
Really? Was it big? Was it like we imagine them to be?
Pretty much like that. Round and flat, with a protrusion on top. Oh, and by the way, the flying saucer was pink.
They were girl aliens?

Please, aliens aren't male and female. Then, from out of the flying saucer came two aliens. They took my hands and wanted to take me into the flying saucer. I was scared out of my mind, and all I could do was follow them.
So what do aliens really look like? Weird?
They were prettier than in the movies, and their eyes weren't that big. They were about as tall as me.
What language did they speak? Could you understand it?

They didn't say a word, and I didn't dare ask. We went into the flying saucer, and the inside was decorated simply. The aliens made me sit, then made me drink some water. Next, they used all kinds of instruments to inspect me.
Like a physical at the hospital?
No, they used instruments that we Earthlings don't have. They were really interested in my appearance, and kept touching my face.
Don't tell me the aliens fell in love with you! Why didn't they take you away with them?
Yeah, you're so good-looking, you should go to the alien planet and promote Earth for us.

After all this, you two still don't believe me. I've told you the most important secret of my life, but you're laughing at me. Forget it! I have even better stories too, but don't even think about getting to hear them.
Oh, we can guess them.
